message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do better than $12000. I'll counteroffer at $16000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14000, but that's my absolute limit. I'm really interested in the product, so I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand you're trying to negotiate, but I've already met you halfway and even a bit more. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'll counteroffer at $15500. This is the lowest price I can accept, and I'm confident it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $15500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13500, but I really think we can do better than that. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle. Can you consider $14000?
